bug.short_desc: minetest included font is licensing problem
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Hello.
minetest included font is licensing problem. Please see debian bug number "851114".
https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?archive=no&bug=851114
Thanks.
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 26 development cycle. Changing version to '26'.
minetest-0.4.16-1.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-08df95e543
minetest-0.4.16-1.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-f8d7049d9b

minetest-0.4.16-1.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-2682a3e196

minetest-0.4.16-1.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-08df95e543
